Articles.Content:
Glad to see Kepler is not quite out of action yet: http://www.nasa.gov/content/kepler-mission-manager-update-pointing-test/

Looking forward to seeing if they can keep it pointing to the degree of accuracy necessary to maintain planetary detection.

Surprised that I haven't seen more about Kepler floating around this forum. I find it so amazing that we, as a race, are searching for a possible new home!
